column5: Just wait a month or two when cabin fever starts to set in, then the iceout countdown will begin!
Hi all,Went out to check the ice the other day…sorry 'bout the curse…but appropriate given the circumstances.
So loud when it cracks- my heart would have stopped and my pants would have gotten heavier!

We were fishing Crow Lake out of Nestor Falls early in the season. There was about 8 inches of ice. We were jigging for trout when a pressure ridge blew up about 10 feet behind us. It shook the ice and sloshed water out of our hole. I just about had a heart attack over that on. We decided to get out of there.
I did the exact same thing as the video. I believe there was 6 or more inches of ice when I did it. Definitely gets you movin. Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
I was just looking at the live web cam at Tomahawk Resort, and there is no ice yet! Is that unusual for this time of year?

Luckily we were at my house…not far to go for a clean pair of gitch.Quote: Originally Posted by BaselineWe were fishing Crow Lake out of Nestor Falls early in the season. There was about 8 inches of ice. We were jigging for trout when a pressure ridge blew up about 10 feet behind us. It shook the ice and sloshed water out of our hole. I just about had a heart attack over that on. We decided to get out of there.OK…now that would be scary as ****…also cool as F$6k!Quote: Originally Posted by WallyWarriorI did the exact same thing as the video. I believe there was 6 or more inches of ice when I did it. Definitely gets you movin. Sent from my iPhone using TapatalkYup exactly 6" there too, even though you know your ok it gets you moving, like you said…lol.Quote: Originally Posted by kayakmattI was just looking at the live web cam at Tomahawk Resort, and there is no ice yet! Is that unusual for this time of year?Very unusual. This winter has broken all previous records for the mild temps. *** I type there is still green grass visible on my lawn…I have been here 9 years and never seen that.
I'm surprised nobody has asked you for an ice out prediction! haha
